bind.calculate: if(/data/is_pregnant = 'yes', if(/data/anc1_complete = 'no', date(/data/anc1_date), if(/data/anc2_complete = 'no', date(/data/anc2_date), if(/data/anc3_complete = 'no', date(/data/anc3_date), if(/data/anc4_complete = 'no', date(/data/anc4_date), format-date('2999-01-01', '%Y-%m-%d'))))), format-date('2999-01-01', '%Y-%m-%d'))
